body_html: Ok I have an idea of what's wrong, we call sample_n in tests before checking for warning, so warns the first time we call sample_n, but not when we're checking for it. Moving the warning test to the top should solve the problem
body_text: Ok I have an idea of what's wrong, we call sample_n in tests before checking for warning, so warns the first time we call sample_n, but not when we're checking for it. Moving the warning test to the top should solve the problem
body: Ok I have an idea of what's wrong, we call `sample_n` in tests before checking for warning, so warns the first time we call `sample_n`, but not when we're checking for it. Moving the warning test to the top should solve the problem
